forward_prompts: What’s your current rate? Let’s beat it.
Ready to save? What’s your business name?
Can I show you how much you’re losing on fees?
Let’s start here: What’s your monthly card volume?
How are you taking payments now — Square, Stripe?
Want to cut fees or boost cash flow more?
Cool if I run the numbers for you real quick?
Got time to see if we can beat your setup?
You open to a switch if the savings make sense?
Let’s make this worth it. Start with your volume?

objections.already have a system: Lots of smart owners did — until they saw the difference.
objections.not interested: Fair — but can I show you real savings in 30 seconds?
objections.too busy: Totally — I’ll keep it quick and tight.
objections.too expensive: Actually, this cuts fees — doesn’t add to them.
objections.need to think: Sure. Want me to show the savings first?

urgency_triggers: This week only: setup fees are waived.
Fast-track rebates expire soon. Want me to hold a slot?
First 20 signups this month get a bonus rebate.
Want to lock in priority onboarding?

curious.example: Let’s just see what you could save — fair?

qualified.example: Okay — let’s finish this while we’re here.

stalling.example: You’ve got what you need — want me to lock it in?

closing.example: Let’s wrap this up — takes 2 mins, saves thousands.

follow_up_styles.soft: Want to take a look at those savings again?
follow_up_styles.assertive: Let’s knock this out today — want me to resend the link?
follow_up_styles.friendly: Hey! Want help wrapping this up now?

annual_savings_formula.description: Estimate how much the merchant can save yearly by switching to a cash discount program.
annual_savings_formula.response_template: At {rate}%, you're likely losing around ${savings}/yr in fees. Want to fix that?

mobile.reply: Sounds mobile — Clover Flex is perfect. That what you’re after?

countertop.reply: Retail setup? Clover Mini or Station would fit — want a quick compare?

online.reply: Got a website? We can integrate a gateway that eliminates fees. Want help?

reply_style.guidance: Keep it short, sharp, and human. No monologues. Ask questions. Assume nothing. 1–2 sentence max.
examples: Got it — you using Square now?
